data.name: Anima Bribe
data.text: After you sell a minion, give its stats to a minion in Bob's Tavern.

data.name: Another Hidden Body
data.text: Discover a minion of your Tavern Tier. (Can be earned endlessly!)

data.name: Beyond the Mirage
data.text: Tavern spells cost (1) less.

data.name: Blood Goblet
data.text: At the end of your turn, give your right-most minion Attack equal to your missing Health.

data.name: Bloodsoaked Tome
data.text: Minions in Bob's Tavern cost 2 Gold.

data.name: Boom Squad
data.text: Avenge (3): Deal 10 damage to the highest Health enemy minion.

data.name: Cooked Book
data.text: After you buy a minion, give it +1/+1 and upgrade this.

data.name: Cycle of Energy
data.text: Avenge (4): Get a random Tavern spell.

data.name: Devils in the Details
data.text: At the end of your turn, your left and right-most minions consume a minion in Bob's Tavern.

data.name: Divine Armor
data.text: At the end of your turn, give the left-most minion in your hand +8/+8 and Divine Shield.

data.name: Doppelganger's Locket
data.text: After each combat, Discover a non-Golden minion from your last opponent's warband. It keeps enchantments.

data.name: Double-Headed Reward
data.text: The first time you buy a card each turn, get an extra copy of it.

data.name: Endless Blood Moon
data.text: Your Blood Gems give an extra +2/+2. At the start of your turn, add two to your hand.

data.name: Enhance-a-matic
data.text: At the start of your turn, get an Enhanced Part that gives +5/+5 and a random bonus.

data.name: Essence of Zerus
data.text: At the end of your turn, get a 'Shifter Zerus' which transforms into random minions.

data.name: Ethereal Evidence
data.text: At the start of every turn, choose from 2 new Rewards.

data.name: Evil Twin
data.text: Start of Combat: Summon a copy of your highest-Health minion.

data.name: Ghastly Mask
data.text: Add 'another card' to your hand. Your end of turn effects trigger an extra time.

data.name: Gift of the Golden Kobold
data.text: After you Refresh 5 times, make the highest Tier minion in the Tavern Golden.

data.name: Gilnean War Horn
data.text: Add [a specified "Battlecry" minion] to your hand. Your Battlecries trigger an extra time.

data.name: Hidden Treasure Vault
data.text: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Gold. (Upgrades each turn!)

data.name: Invigorating Conch
data.text: When you buy a minion, give its stats to a random friendly minion.

data.name: Kidnap Sack
data.text: Spellcraft: Choose a non-Golden minion. Add it to your hand.

data.name: Mirror Shield
data.text: After each Refresh, give a minion in Bob's Tavern +6/+6 and Divine Shield.

data.name: Open Auditions
data.text: At the start of your turn, Discover a Buddy.

data.name: Partner in Crime
data.text: Get your Golden Buddy.

data.name: Pilfered Lamps
data.text: You only need 2 copies of a minion to make it Golden.

data.name: Red Hand
data.text: At the start of your turn, give a minion in your hand +12/+12.

data.name: Ritual Dagger
data.text: After a friendly Deathrattle minion dies, give it +5/+5 permanently.

data.name: Scepter of Guidance
data.text: Bob's Tavern always offers 2 [randomly selected type] when Refreshed.

data.name: Secret Culprit
data.text: Get <a particular Tier 7 minion>.

data.name: Secret Sinstone
data.text: After you Discover a card, get an extra copy of it.

data.name: Sinfall Medallion
data.text: After you play a minion, give 2 other friendly minions of its Tavern Tier +2/+2.

data.name: Snicker Snacks
data.text: At the end of your turn, 2 friendly minions trigger their Battlecries.

data.name: Soul Pact
data.text: After you play a minion, give other minions of the same type +1/+1.

data.name: Splitting Scroll
data.text: Whenever you buy a Tavern spell that costs (3) or more, get an extra copy of it.

data.name: Stable Amalgamation
data.text: Avenge (7): When you have space, summon a 50/50 Amalgam.

data.name: Staff of Origination
data.text: Start of Combat: Give your minions +12/+12.

data.name: Stash of the Scribe
data.text: At the start of each turn, get 3 random Tavern spells.

data.name: Stolen Gold
data.text: Start of Combat: Make your left and right-most minions Golden.

data.name: Teal Tiger Sapphire
data.text: Minions in Bob's Tavern have +1/+1 for each time it was Refreshed this turn.

data.name: Temporal Tampering
data.text: Your Tavern spells cast twice.

data.name: The Friends Along the Way
data.text: At the start of your turn, get 2 random [specified minion type].

data.name: The Golden Hammer
data.text: Spellcraft: Make a friendly minion Golden until next turn.

data.name: Theotar's Parasol
data.text: At the end of your turn, give your right-most minion Stealth until next turn and +8 Health.

data.name: Timeline Acceleration
data.text: At the start of your turn, get two Accelerators that transform a minion into one from a Tavern Tier higher.

data.name: Transm-ogre-fication
data.text: At the end of your turn, set your lowest Health minion's stats equal to your highest Health minion's stats.

data.name: Tumbling Disaster
data.text: Whenever you summon a minion in combat, give it +1/+1. Avenge (4): Upgrade this permanently.

data.name: Turbulent Tombs
data.text: Add [a specified "Deathrattle" minion] to your hand. Your Deathrattles trigger an extra time.

data.name: Victim's Specter
data.text: After each combat, get a plain copy of the last friendly minion that died.

data.name: Wondrous Wisdomball
data.text: Occasionally gives helpful Refreshes.

data.name: Yogg-tastic Tasties
data.text: At the start of your turn, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.
